History & Fortresses.description: For travelers who enjoy historical sites, architecture, fortifications, and stories of past eras.
typical_activities: Visit old citadels and fortress walls
Explore museums related to archaeology or military history
History & Fortresses.example_recommendation: Start with the city citadel, explore its gates and ramparts, then continue to nearby archaeological sites.
alba_iulia_recommendations: Explore the Alba Carolina Citadel, including all baroque gates
Walk along the fortress ramparts for great panoramic views
Visit the Unification Hall and Union Museum
Check the Roman Castrum ruins inside the citadel

Nature & Easy Walks.description: For people who prefer green spaces, relaxing walks, and scenic outdoor spots.
Nature & Easy Walks.example_recommendation: Begin with a scenic trail, enjoy the greenery, and take a slow path along the river or city parks.
alba_iulia_recommendations: Walk the Three Fortifications Trail
Relax in Parkul Cetății inside the citadel
Enjoy slow strolls around the fortress walls at sunset
Follow the pedestrian paths between bastions

Art & Museums.description: Perfect for visitors who enjoy galleries, cultural centers, and museums.
Art & Museums.example_recommendation: Visit a major museum first, then stop by a smaller gallery and finish with a peaceful artistic area.
alba_iulia_recommendations: National Museum of the Union (large, diverse collection)
Lapidarium and Roman artifacts
Icons and frescoes inside the Orthodox Cathedral Museum
Historic murals and architectural details in the citadel

Food & Wine.description: For those who travel to taste — local dishes, wines, and authentic dining experiences.
Food & Wine.example_recommendation: Start with a small snack, move to a local winery, and end with a traditional dinner.
alba_iulia_recommendations: Traditional dinner at Pub 13 inside medieval barracks
Wine tasting at Wine Bar La Poartă
Try Transylvanian bulz and sarmale at La Conac
Grab local pastries and covrigi around the citadel

Nightlife.description: For travelers who want bars, live music, clubs, or social nightlife spots.
Nightlife.example_recommendation: Start with a casual bar for warm-up drinks, then visit a lively club or music venue.
alba_iulia_recommendations: Chill cocktail bars around the citadel
Wine-focused evening at La Poartă
Local pubs with live music depending on the night
Easy night walks around the illuminated fortress walls

Full Day.description: A complete exploration from morning to evening.
Full Day.example_plan: Morning outdoor activity, mid-day museum, afternoon food break, evening walk or nightlife.
alba_iulia_recommendations: Morning Three Fortifications Trail walk
Mid-day museum and cathedral visits
Traditional lunch inside the citadel
Evening stroll on fortress walls and wine tasting

Half Day.example_plan: Museum visit, quick food, short walk and a relaxed ending.
alba_iulia_recommendations: Start at National Museum of the Union
Visit the Lapidarium
Grab quick local snacks
Walk around bastions and fortress gardens

Evening Chill.description: Slow-paced evening activity, ideal for food, wine, and relaxed exploring.
Evening Chill.example_plan: Light walk, scenic views, dinner or wine bar.
alba_iulia_recommendations: Sunset walk on the citadel walls
Dinner at La Conac or Gavroche
Wine bar visit
Night photography inside the citadel

Relaxed.description: Slow tempo, minimal walking, plenty of breaks.
Relaxed.example: Focus on atmosphere, calm views, and cozy restaurants.
alba_iulia_recommendations: Take slow walks around the citadel gardens
Choose restaurants with terrace seating
Spend extra time at wine bars or cafés
Avoid multi-stop routes; enjoy longer stays

Active.description: Energetic approach — more walking, more stops, more exploration.
Active.example: See as much as possible within the time available.
alba_iulia_recommendations: Climb and explore all fortress bastions
Visit multiple museums in a row
Follow the outer defensive path of the fortress
Add nearby natural trails to extend the route

Local Specialties.description: Focus on traditional dishes and authentic regional flavors.
Local Specialties.example: Choose a restaurant that serves authentic regional meals.
alba_iulia_recommendations: Bulz ardelenesc
Sarmale
Ciorbă in bread
Papanasi dessert

Vegetarian.description: Meals without meat, focusing on fresh and light options.
alba_iulia_recommendations: Cheese platters at wine bars
Vegetarian soups at traditional restaurants
Fresh pastries and placinte
Local salads and veggie sides

Fast Food.description: Quick and convenient meals — street food, bakery treats, handheld bites.
Fast Food.example: Grab local pastries or quick bites between sightseeing stops.
alba_iulia_recommendations: Covrigi (Romanian pretzels)
Placinte (local stuffed pastries)
Quick shawarma stands near the citadel
Street desserts and snacks

Anything Tasty.description: Open to any good food, flexible and adventurous.
Anything Tasty.example: Combine fast bites with a traditional meal for the best experience.
alba_iulia_recommendations: Mix wine tasting with local snacks
Try both pastry stops and full restaurants
Combine traditional dishes with modern bistro food
Explore random street food stands inside the citadel
